hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Keaton Mask#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #4# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Letter# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Red Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #5# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Deku Tree Compass# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Keaton Mask#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: Having trouble defeating Dark Link?^Look away from him while holding Z-Target and then when Dark Link walks up behind you, strafe sideways and slash your sword.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
